subject: Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: Hank Ratner, who was also the chief executive of Madison Square Garden, is now its vice chairman, and Tad Smith, the president of local media for Cablevision, has succeeded him.
snippet: Hank Ratner, who was also the chief executive of Madison Square Garden, is now its vice chairman, and Tad Smith, the president of local media for Cablevision, has succeeded him.
